This game excels in immersion. Once I started playing I couldn't stop. I played this on 360 years ago and wasn't paying much attention to the game. After about 6 years I've finally come back and this game is one of the best. The story is amazing and is very easy to get immersed by any player. The gameplay is fun and satisfying to do and every puzzle was designed very well. Overall, I recommend 2 playthroughs to look for all the easter eggs or just do all the achievements to appreciate the story/ gameplay. Being only 2 bucks right now (from sale) this is easily the best deal of any game I've ever had. Only issue with the game is that there isn't another one!

UNA OBRA MAESTRA, DISEÑO DE NIVELES DE 10, HISTORIA MUY BUENA E INTERESANTE, UN LORE INCREIBLE, MECANICAS FABULOSAS, DIOS ES QUE NUNCA HE VISTO UN JUEGO QUE ESTE A NADA DE LA PERFECCION, SIMPLEMENTE !!!!!!COMPRALO AHORA MISMO!!!!!!!

i hold this game so close to my heart. i used to play it so much back when i was younger and didn't see how good it was until coming back to it recently. this game is amazing. even though the game was released in 2011, the story, mechanics, puzzles, and more hold up very well nearly 10 years later. i'd recommend this game to PC Newcomers, or people who don't have very great hardware, as it runs pretty well on almost any machine. this game is awesome. period.

I just completed the single player storymode of this game and it is bloody incredible. Highly recommend it to anyone who likes mind games and a good sci-fi storyline. (or half life as well, i heard black mesa mentioned in there so i am guessing it is in the half life universe)

The game is SO fun. I know it's 12 years old by now and a review probably isn't necessary, but it truly is a work of art. The puzzles are challenging but not impossible, and the dialogue is really enjoyable. Love the post-chapter-5 dynamic and the end of the game is so cool even after playing it 5 times. And the MUSIC and atmosphere. I love it. The co-op is fantastic as well. Definitely recommend.

Portal 2 is an absolute masterpiece. I owned this game on other systems and accounts and probably have over 200 hours. If you don't purchase this game while it's on sale (as of 3/28/2021) for $3, you are losing a huge chance to play an absolute masterpiece.

Игра обалденная! Играл с другом. Интеллект, который комментирует игру, на протяжении всего прохождения делал нам с другом такие комплименты и неожиданные повороты событий, что у меня теперь нету друга. Оказывается, мой друг был в заговоре с интеллектом и оскорблял мои навыки игры. Поиграйте с друзьями, вам понравиться)

Her ne kadar yüzlerce oyun bitirmemiş olsam da Portal 2 hayatımda oynadığım en iyi oyun olabilir. Hikayenin çok başarılı kurgulanması, diyalogların kendine hayran bırakması, tam tadında ayarlanmış zorluk, asla sıkmayan bölüm tasarımları, karakterlerin mizahi yönü ve sonunda çalan "Want You Gone" ile eşsiz ve mükemmel bir oyun. Verilebilecek en yüksek puan neyse onu hak ediyor gözümde.
